page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: Sidlesham Memorial Recreation Ground is owned by Sidlesham Parish Council.There is a childrens playground on it which is run by the Parish Council.The rest of it is leased to Sidlesham Football Club.They have a Social Club House on it where they have other clubs such as darts and snooker.There is a bar there and a committee room and they sometimes have dances and discos there.They also let it out to the Good Companions Club,the British Legion Club and for things like weddings.The profit from the bar and when they let it out is used to pay for the pitches and other things. There is a network of footpaths around Sidlesham and Pagham Harbour Nature Reserve.The W.I have made booklets about these walks. Zara's Riding Stables in Sidlesham give riding lessons and have gymkhanas
